summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PixelForge pixel art converter. All core features working correctly including image upload, real-time conversion, color palette customization, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Upload zone display and hide functionality
Drag and drop file upload simulation
Real-time pixel art conversion with image loaded
Color palette display (20 colors with hex codes)
Color palette customization via color picker
Before/After preview display (Original and Pixel Art)
Orange and beige color scheme validation
UI element accessibility with data-testid attributes
